content: posh f iber designs ____________________________________________________________________________ wrapped in love designed by marie fullen/posh fiber designs this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only the pattern may not be copied resold or redistributed in any way you may sell any items produced please credit the designer posh f iber designs ____________________________________________________________________________ this beautiful baby afghan measures 41 x41 it can easily be adjusted to any size by continuing the entire repeat section yarn yarn bee sugarwheel cotton - nutmeg nibbles 4 cakes hook us 7/4 5mm notes chain 3 at beginning of round counts as double_crochet terminology/abbreviations chain = chain space = space single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch dcpb = double_crochet back post puff = puff special stitches puff yarn over and insert your hook into the specified stitch/space yarn over again and pull up a long loop yarn over and insert your hook into the same stitch/space yarn over again and pull up a long loop three more times yarn over and pull through all 9 loops on your hook chain 1 to close the puff v- stitch work 1 double_crochet chain-2 st and 1 more double_crochet st in the same chain or space ____________________________________________________________________________ this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only the pattern may not be copied resold or redistributed in any way you may sell any items produced please credit the designer 2 posh f iber designs ____________________________________________________________________________ pattern begin with a magic_ring 1 chain-3 2 double_crochet chain-2 3 double_crochet chain-2 3 times join with slip_stitch to top of starting chain-3 2 slip_stitch to next chain-2 space chain 3 1 double_crochet chain-2 2 double_crochet in chain-2 double_crochet in next 3 sts * 2dc chain-2 2dc in chain 2 space double_crochet in next 3 sts** repeat from * to ** 2 more times join with slip_stitch 7 sts between chain-2 sps 3 slip_stitch to next chain-2 space chain 3 1 double_crochet chain-2 2 double_crochet in chain-2 1dc st in each stitch to next corner * 2dc chain-2 2dc in chain 2 space 1dc st in each stitch to next corner** repeat from * to ** 2 more times join with slip_stitch 11 sts between chain-2 sps 4 slip_stitch to next chain-2 space chain 3 1 double_crochet chain-2 2 double_crochet in chain-2 chain-1 skip next st puff st in next space repeat to end of row chain-1 skip next st * 2dc chain-2 2-double_crochet in chain-2 space chain-1 skip next st puff st in next st chain-1 skip next st ** repeat * to ** 2 more times 5 puff stitches 6 chain-1 sps 4 double_crochet between chain-2 sps 5 slip_stitch to next chain-2 space chain 3 1 double_crochet chain-2 2 double_crochet in chain-2 1dc st in each stitch to next corner * 2dc chain-2 2dc in chain 2 space 1dc st in each stitch to next corner** repeat from * to ** 2 more times join with slip_stitch 19 sts between chain-2 sps 6 slip_stitch to next chain-2 space chain 3 1 double_crochet chain-2 2
